data.title: Rumor Has It That: Rihanna & A$AP Rocky Are ‘Taking a Break’
data.meta_description: Rumor has it that Rihanna and her husband, rapper A$AP Rocky are "taking a break" from each other
data.meta_site_name: Sandra Rose | Latest Celebrity News, Sports & Entertainment
data.text:
Rumor has it that Rihanna and her husband, rapper A$AP Rocky are “taking a break” from each other. Rihanna was seen dining alone at San Vincent’s Bungalow Club in West Hollywood on Halloween night, Oct. 31.

A confidential source says Rihanna had a quiet dinner alone after she and A$AP decided to give each other a break. The pop singer was dressed in leather pants and a leather coat. She looked sad as she left the restaurant alone and walked to her car.

The source said Rihanna and Rocky argue constantly – like most newlywed couples do.

Earlier that day, A$AP Rocky was seen shopping alone at Bottega Veneta on Melrose in West Hollywood, Ca. The father of 2 wore a leather coat and cargo pants. He carried a shopping bag to his blue Bentley Azure convertible after doing some retail therapy.

Rihanna and A$AP, both 35, share two sons, 1-year-old RZA and Riot Rose, who was born in August. They were secretly married earlier this year in RiRi’s native Barbados.
